title: Neighborhood businesses learn accessibility from Alex
description: Neighborhood businesses learn accessibility from Alex
content:
Scenario: Neighborhood businesses learn accessibility from Alex
    Given local businesses often lack accessibility awareness
    And Alex's feedback could improve business accessibility
    When Alex interacts with neighborhood businesses
    Then the neighborhood_elohim should facilitate Alex providing accessibility feedback
    And businesses should receive Alex's expertise as valuable service
    And improvements should be tracked and celebrated
    And Alex should be compensated for consultation when appropriate
    And accessible businesses benefit from disability community patronage
    And the neighborhood should become more accessible through Alex's guidance
    And Alex's care work includes making local economy accessible
